item.title: About
item.description:
Semantic UI Fixed Template

This is a basic fixed menu template using fixed size containers.

A text container is used for the main container, which is useful for single column layouts

item.title: Welcome!
item.description:
Hackodex

Changing the World with Technology, Ideas, & Hard Work.

Saturday, August 8th 2015, 9:30 am (MDT)

Thursday, August 13th 2015, 12:00 am (MDT)

About this Eevent …

YOLO cold-pressed pork belly actually, literally Echo Park artisan twee fingerstache Shoreditch authentic four dollar toast ennui. Banh mi farm-to-table iPhone, mumblecore Bushwick Wes Anderson plaid drinking vinegar Brooklyn irony. Fixie shabby chic chillwave, mumblecore plaid McSweeney's bespoke vegan Godard locavore Truffaut.

Read More …

Fantastic Prizes!

We want you to bring your best, and so we are offering some really great prizes for this event.

Prizes | Rules | Judging
Pearson eCollege Headquarters
2154 E. Commons Avenue, Suite 4000,
Centennial, CO 80122

We Our Sponsors

Thanks to our sponsors and partners below, we're able to have a great hackathon.

And More!

item.title: Agenda
item.description:
All times are in MDT

Notes: Get some standard event types and icons for such. Also figure out a way to display multiple tracks on one page, and fix event styling. Determine if it will be better to have a day marker and then times, OR, if it is better to have the days on the event info boxes themselves. Probably the former.

10:00 am - 11:30 am
Lightning Talks

Talks by our sponsors, and explanationsq of special prizes to be won
